meanings.definition: The state or quality of being gleeful.
meanings.sent1: Her gleefulnesses were evident in her constant laughter.
meanings.sent2: The children's gleefulnesses could be heard throughout the playground.
meanings.sent3: The gleefulnesses of the puppy as it chased its tail brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: The gleefulnesses of the flowers blooming in spring seemed to dance in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The gleefulnesses of the baby's giggles filled the room with pure joy.

meanings.definition: The feeling of joy or happiness.
meanings.sent1: His eyes sparkled with gleefulnesses when he saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent2: The gleefulnesses on her face were contagious, spreading joy to all around her.
meanings.sent3: The gleefulnesses of winning the game made the team jump with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The gleefulnesses of the birds chirping in the morning signaled the start of a beautiful day.
meanings.sent5: The gleefulnesses of receiving a heartfelt compliment can brighten anyone's day.
